about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 197: Heroic Characters 38

A heaping helping of 32 heroes and heroines arrives! Masterful feline monks stand ready for battle alongside deadly Drow duelists and massive mammoth barbarians! Show your heroes the meaning of bravery with these amazing allies!
  • M_Elven_Duelist
  • F_Hum_Young_Necro2
  • F_Human_Swamper
  • F_tielfing_forest_bard_S
  • M_Aasimar_mage

  • M_Firbolg_ranger

  • M_Goliath_Bearform
  • M_Half_elf_maninblack
  • M_HalfOrc_Spear2
  • M_Knight_of_Hammers2

  • M_Kobold_WarPriest
  • M_Mammoth_Brawler
  • M_Mammoth_Brawler2

  • M_Swashbuckler
  • M_tielfing_Sword_mage
  • M_Tiger_Monk

  • M_Vampire_Spawn
"
